actions.description: The officer shouts orders and targets up to two other creatures within 60 feet of itself. If a target has the Draconic Devotion trait and can hear the officer, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack.

specialTraits.description: While the officer can see a Dragon that isn't hostile to it, the officer has advantage on attack rolls.
